title: Sharing a Pond
description: Brent shows up on Corey and Shane's doorstep in the dead of winter needing a place to stay—and hopeful his mates will provide it, and not mind he's a frog shifter.Being a shifter is nothing new to Corey and Shane, but neither is being mates. They've been together since before they first met Brent ten years ago—back when Brent was Brenda. Bringing a third into their relationship is more than a little complicated, but they're willing to try.But change is always easier said than done, and Brent wonders if he ever really stood a chance at being happy with the men he has always loved and admired.
author: Alex Whitehall
